solution_line_template: If each of the {num_customers} customers bought {marbles_per_customer} marbles, then they bought {num_customers}*{marbles_per_customer} = <<{num_customers}*{marbles_per_customer}={total_marbles_bought}>>{total_marbles_bought} marbles in total from Mr Julien's store.
The number of marbles remaining in the store is {initial_marbles}-{total_marbles_bought} = <<{initial_marbles}-{total_marbles_bought}={marbles_remaining}>>{marbles_remaining} marbles
